entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
I received the M. Eng. degree and B. Eng. degree in Computer Science from South China University of Technology in 2019 and 2016 respectively. I continue my research life as a phD. candidate. My research interests include computer vision, image processing, sparse codingn and deep learning.

Publications

Journal Papers

Full-reference image quality metric for blurry images and compressed images using hybrid dictionary learning
Zihan Zhou, Jing Li, Yong Xu, Yuhui Quan*
